name: VNDetectContoursRequest
desc: A request that detects the contours of the edges of an image.

items.name: var contrastAdjustment: Float
items.desc: The amount by which to adjust the image contrast.

items.name: var contrastPivot: NSNumber?
items.desc: The pixel value to use as a pivot for the contrast.

items.name: var detectsDarkOnLight: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request detects a dark object on a light background to aid in detection.

items.name: var maximumImageDimension: Int
items.desc: The maximum image dimension to use for contour detection.

items.name: var results: [VNContoursObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the request to detect contours.

items.name: class VNContoursObservation
items.desc: An object that represents the detected contours in an image.

items.name: let VNDetectContourRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the detect contours request.
